meta.content: Khan Basharat - Electronics Engineer & AI/ML Expert
Khan Basharat - Electronics Engineer & AI/ML Expert

head.script: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Person", "name": "Basharat Ahmad Khan", "alternateName": ["Khan Basharat", "khanbasharat3a1", "Basharat Ahmad Khan Duli"], "jobTitle": "Electronics Engineer & AI/ML Expert", "description": "Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT, and Embedded Systems", "url": "https://www.khanbasharat.com", "email": "khanbasharat3a1@gmail.com", "telephone": "+91-8899977743", "address": { "@type": "PostalAddress", "streetAddress": "22, Check Treran", "addressLocality": "Tangmarg", "addressRegion": "Jammu & Kashmir", "addressCountry": "IN" }, "alumniOf": "Model Institute of Engineering and Technology", "knowsAbout": ["Artificial Intelligence", "Machine Learning", "IoT", "Embedded Systems", "Python", "SEO", "Data Science"], "sameAs": [ "https://www.linkedin.com/in/khanbasharat", "https://github.com/khanbasharat", "https://www.techinsiderplus.com" ] }

div.p: Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT, and Embedded Systems. Passionate about bridging technology with real-world applications.
Get to know more about my background and expertise

I am a passionate Electronics & Communication Engineer specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, IoT, and Embedded Systems. With hands-on experience in hardware design, software development, and data science, I strive to bridge the gap between technology and real-world applications.

I've worked on projects ranging from IoT-based automation and robotics to AI-powered healthcare solutions. As a co-founder of Tech Insider Plus, I actively explore emerging technologies and have built a tech blog reaching millions of users with over 500K monthly impressions.

My skills span Python, C, MATLAB, Embedded C, Flask, VHDL, SQL, and web development. Currently, I'm focused on developing innovative solutions that enhance efficiency and accessibility in various industries.
My journey through various roles and responsibilities

div.div: Currently working as Technical Support Trainee, providing technical assistance and support to clients.

div.p: Gained hands-on experience in power systems, HVAC/utilities, plant production, water filtration, and Effluent Treatment Plant (ETP) operations.

ul.li: Designed a water tank flow control system during the water filtration process
Optimized water management and enhanced efficiency
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement system improvements
Applied theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios

div.p: Founded and led Tech Insider Plus, a thriving tech blog that became a respected tech news source.

ul.li: Built tech blog reaching millions of users
Achieved 500K+ monthly impressions through SEO mastery
Grew business valuation to $10K with multiple acquisition offers
Generated revenue through affiliate marketing and guest post services
Guided dynamic team in content creation and marketing
Developed predictive models using Python and R
Created data visualizations and technical reports
Conducted thorough data cleaning, preprocessing, and exploratory analysis
Presented findings through clear visualizations to stakeholders

div.div: Worked on AI and Machine Learning projects, gaining practical experience in implementing AI solutions.

div.p: My academic journey and learning path

p.strong: Model Institute of Engineering and Technology

div.p: November 2021 - November 2025
Pursuing B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering with focus on AI/ML, IoT, and Embedded Systems.
August 2021 - August 2025
Specialized minor degree focusing on AI/ML concepts, algorithms, and practical implementations.

p.strong: Govt Higher Sec. School Chandilora, Tangmarg

div.p: Completed higher secondary education with focus on Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry.
Some of my notable academic and personal projects
Smart home automation system using Arduino and IoT sensors for remote monitoring and control of home appliances.
Machine learning model for disease prediction and health monitoring using patient data and medical history analysis.
Interactive dashboard built with Python and Flask for real-time data visualization and business intelligence.
Professional certifications and achievements

div.h4: Building AI Powered Chatbots Without Programming
Getting Started with AI using IBM Watson
Machine Learning Foundations: A Case Study Approach
Python for Data Science, AI & Development

div.p: Technologies and tools I work with
Let's connect and create something amazing together
Feel free to reach out to me for any inquiries, collaborations, or opportunities.

div.div:
Address
22, Check Treran, Tangmarg
Baramulla, Jammu & Kashmir, India
